block_comment: This block synchronizes data transfers and handles resets. On the rising edge of `out_clk` or `out_reset`, if `out_reset` is asserted, it resets `out_data_toggle_flopped` to `0` and clears `out_data_buffer`. Otherwise, it transfers the data from `in_data_buffer` to `out_data_buffer`. If `out_data_taken` is asserted, it updates `out_data_toggle_flopped` to the value of `out_data_toggle`, ensuring data coherence between cycles.
